section.name: maturity
section.title: Maturity
section.desc: Maturity of the project in charge of the product's development and maintenance

element.name: age
element.title: Age
element.desc1: between three months and three years

element.name: historyknowproblems
element.title: History
element.desc0: The software has many problems which can be prohibitive
element.desc1: No major crisis, or unknown history
element.desc2: Good past experience in crisis management

element.name: activity
element.title: Activity
element.desc: Activity inside and around the project

element.name: contributingcommunity
element.title: Contributing community
element.desc0: No real community nor activity (forum, mailing list...)
element.desc2: Strong community with vivid activity in forums, with many contributors and supporters

element.name: activityonbugs
element.title: Activity on bugs
element.desc0: Low reactivity in forums and mailing lists, or no mention about bugfixes in release notes
element.desc1: Existing activity but without any clearly defined process or with long resolution times
element.desc2: Strong reactivity based on roles and task assignments

element.name: activityonfunctionalities
element.title: Activity on features
element.desc1: Product's evolution is led by a dedicated team or by users, but without a clearly stated process
element.desc2: Feature request process is industrialized, an associated roadmap is available

element.name: activityonreleases
element.title: Activity on releases/versions
element.desc0: Very low activity on the production or development versions (alpha, beta)
element.desc1: Activity on production or development versions (alpha, beta), with frequent minor corrective versions
element.desc2: Important activity with frequent corrective versions and planned major versions linked with the roadmap

element.name: copyrightowners
element.title: Copyright Holders
element.desc0: Rights are held by a few individuals or commercial entities
element.desc1: Rights are uniformly held by many individuals
element.desc2: Rights are held by a legal entity or a foundation that the community trust (eg FSF, Apache, ObjectWeb)

element.name: roadmap
element.title: Roadmap
element.desc2: Versioned roadmap with planning and delay measurements

element.name: ID_740641571
element.title: Project management
element.desc0: No clear and apparent project management
element.desc1: Project managed by an individual or a single commercial entity
element.desc2: strong independence of core team, rights held by a recognized entity

element.name: ID_548761152
element.title: Distribution mode
element.desc0: Dual distribution with a commercial version along with a functionally limited free one
element.desc1: Subparts are only available under a proprietary license (core, plugins...)

element.name: services
element.title: Services
element.desc1: Limited service offering (geographically, to a single language, to a single provider or without warranty
element.desc2: Rich ecosystem of services provided by multiple suppliers, with guaranteed results

element.name: documentation
element.title: Documentation
element.desc1: Documentation exists but is partly obsolete or restricted to one language or to few details
element.desc2: Documentation up to date, translated and possibly adapted to several target readers (enduser, sysadmin, manager...)

element.name: qualityassurance
element.title: Quality assurance
element.desc1: Existing QA processes, but they are not formalized or equipped
element.desc2: QA process based on standard tools and methodologies

element.name: modificationofsourcecode
element.title: Source code modification
element.desc0: No convenient way to propose source code modifications
element.desc1: Tools are provided to access and modify the code (eg SCM, forge...) but are not really used by core team to develop the product
element.desc2: The contributing process is well defined, exposed and respected, it is based on clearly defined roles
